entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50.
